meanings.definition: Unable to be contained or restrained.
meanings.sent1: The excitement of the children was uncontainable.
meanings.sent2: The wildfire was uncontainable, spreading rapidly through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The uncontainable laughter of the clown filled the entire circus tent.
meanings.sent4: Her uncontainable energy was like a burst of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The uncontainable joy of winning the championship was written all over his face.

meanings.definition: Not able to be controlled or managed.
meanings.sent1: The toddler's uncontainable tantrum disrupted the entire store.
meanings.sent2: The uncontainable growth of the weeds in the garden required constant attention.
meanings.sent3: The uncontainable chaos of the party made it a night to remember.
meanings.sent4: Her uncontainable curiosity led her to explore every corner of the museum.
meanings.sent5: The uncontainable excitement of the fans filled the stadium with cheers.
